title: custom IOCTL code
extract: Defining the Custom IOCTL Value. When you decide that your device driver will support an operation via an IOCTL command, you must define a command code that callers can use. wdj.h (Listing 1) contains the definition of my custom IOCTL command code.Feb 1, 1997
extract_html: Defining the Custom IOCTL Value. When you decide that your device driver will support an operation via an IOCTL command, you must define a command code that callers can use. wdj.h (Listing 1) contains the definition of my custom IOCTL command code.Feb 1, 1997
